workshoptitle: Simplify distributed transactions with Oracle MicroTx to prevent inconsistent data and financial losses

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisite for customers using the Sandbox. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set Up the Environment
tutorials.description: Verify the setup of the Compute instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Integrate MicroTx Client Libraries with XA Sample Application
Lab 3: Provision Autonomous Databases for Use as Resource Manager
Lab 4: Trade Stocks with the Bank and Stock-Trading Application
